article:
Walt Disney was born on December 5, 1901 in Chicago Illinois while he lived most of his childhood in Marceline, Missouri.
Since young, Walt showed great 21 _  in art. He would often sell drawings to neighbors to make 22 _  money. Though his father could be quite 23 _ ,and often there was little money in the family, Walt was 24 _  by his mother, and older brother to 25 _  his attention on what he loved deeply. 
In 1918,Disney 26 _  to enter the army. However, he was 27 _  because he was under age, only 16 at the time. 28 Instead ,Walt joined the Red Cross and was 29 _  to France, where he spent a year driving an ambulance .His ambulance was 30 _  not with army camouflage ,but with Disney cartoons.
Once Walt31 _  from France to America, he started a small company which finally 32 turned out  to be a failure. With twenty dollars, Walt 33 _  for Hollywood to try his luck. After making a 34 _  of his "Alice Comedies", Walt became a(an)35 _  Hollywood figure. In 1932,Flowers and Trees(the first color1 cartoon)36 _  Walt the first of his studio's Academy Awards. His dream of a clean, and organized amusement park 37 came true  as Disneyland Park opened in 1955. 
Walt Disney is a hero of the 20th century. His worldwide popularity was 38 _  on the ideals : imagination, creation and self-made success in the American 39 _ .He brought us closer to the future 40 _  telling us of the past. It is certain that Walt Disney is a great man.
